reviews.body: While the film has been mostly applauded, that for me was where the good stuff ended. First of all, it is interminable. 2 hours and 56 minutes!!!! I mean.that is not necessary.
reviews.title: The Batman

reviews.body: Yes, its more end-of-the-world bilge from Roland Emmerich.
reviews.title: Moonfall

reviews.body: The blandest action-adventure movie seen in some time. If only we could press the “reset” button.
reviews.title: Uncharted
